abstract: In a new column for the Moment blog, Lynn Yaeger peeks at people's terrifically odd, amusing and magnificent collections, starting with the robot menagerie of the photographer Mary Ellen Mark.
snippet: In a new column for the Moment blog, Lynn Yaeger peeks at people's terrifically odd, amusing and magnificent collections, starting with the robot menagerie of the photographer Mary Ellen Mark.

headline.main: Mary Ellen Mark and the Robots
